00001 % ======================================================================
00002 %> @brief phantom_rods calculates permittivity distribution for rod phantom
00003 %> creates numerical phantom with rods using list of positions and values
00004 %> the permittivity value is calculated only for FOV region
00005 %>
00006 %> @param discret_matrix_size_mm   side 'matrix size' in milimeters
00007 %> @param discret_matrix_size      side matrix size [number of grid elements]
00008 %> @param list                     vector of structures position (r,a), diameter and value for rods
00009 %> @param fov_permit               permittivity of field of view 
00010 %>
00011 %> @retval ph_map (matrix) permittivity
00012 % =====================================================================
00013 function[ph_map] = phantom_rods(phobj,discret_matrix_size_mm,discret_matrix_size, list, fov_permit)
00014 
00015     disp 'phantom - rods 2 map';
00016 
00017     ph_map = phobj.phantom_generate(discret_matrix_size_mm,discret_matrix_size,list,fov_permit);
